text: I wish I could teleport to you right now, hold your hand, and tell you everything will be okay 💗
Even the brightest stars have cloudy nights. You’re still my whole galaxy 🌌
Whatever you're feeling right now, you don’t have to face it alone. I’m right here, always 💞
You don’t need to be okay for me to love you. I love you even when you’re not okay 💌
Your heart is so kind and beautiful — it’s okay if it feels heavy sometimes. Let me carry some of that weight for you 💖
I would do anything just to see that soft smile of yours again ☁️😊
It’s okay to cry. It just means your heart is honest and real — like you ❤️
If I could, I’d wrap you up in a blanket burrito and tuck you in with kisses 🫶🌯
You don’t have to fix everything right now. Just breathe. I’ll hold the space for you 🌸
You are loved beyond words. On your worst days, and your best days. Always 💗
I’m not there in person, but I’m sending 100 invisible hugs your way 🤗💨
If the world feels too loud, I’ll be your quiet corner. Your peace. Your person 🌷
You’re allowed to rest. You don’t have to earn love here — you already have it, endlessly 💞
Close your eyes for a second and imagine me kissing your forehead and whispering ‘I’m here’ 💋🫂
Even when you feel messy or emotional, I see the softest parts of you — and I love them 🌿
I don’t need you to pretend. Just be you. That’s more than enough for me 🩷
If all you can do today is exist, that’s okay. That’s still brave. And I’m proud of you 💘
You matter. You matter. You matter. I’ll remind you as many times as you need 💌
When the world feels too much, come hide in my love. It’s always open to you 🌙
You're not a burden. You're a blessing. My favourite person in the whole universe 💫
